title: Dan + Shay on If They’ve Ever Got Into a Fight…And Amy Can Only Ask Them 4 Word-Questions + Name That Christmas Country Singer: Silent Night + Amy Had Another Encounter with a Rude Stranger
itunes:title: Dan + Shay on If They’ve Ever Got Into a Fight…And Amy Can Only Ask Them 4 Word-Questions + Name That Christmas Country Singer: Silent Night + Amy Had Another Encounter with a Rude Stranger
description:
We talk to Dan + Shay about their Grammy nominations, new Christmas songs and if they’ve ever got into a fight. Amy also has a chance to ask them only 4-word questions. We play another round of that Name Country Christmas singer: name the artist singing Silent Night. Amy has yet another encounter with a rude stranger at the mall. We debate on whether she is in the wrong this time…

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
